_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Lavalink
author: damuffin36@gmail.com
description:
Standalone audio sending node based on Lavaplayer and JDA-Audio. Allows for sending audio without it ever reaching any of your shards.
Description taken from https://github.com/Frederikam/Lavalink

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# NodeJS Bot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y git curl openjdk-11-jre-headless openjdk-11-jdk-headless

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

curl -L -o Lavalink.jar https://github.com/frederikam/Lavalink/releases/latest/download/Lavalink.jar

curl -L -o application.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Frederikam/Lavalink/master/LavalinkServer/application.yml.example

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
